summary: A comprehensive test suite for the AWS SSO Admin integration, using Moto to mock AWS services. It validates server endpoint behavior, CRUD operations on permission sets and account assignments, instance management, and policy handling, ensuring the SSO admin client functions correctly in a simulated environment.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable operation of the SSO administration features within the application by automatically testing all major SSO admin actions—such as creating, updating, listing, and deleting permission sets, managing account assignments, handling instances, and applying policies—before deployment to production.
